verses.verse: אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei These [are] the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel רְאוּבֵ֤ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven Reuben שִׁמְעוֹן֙ <S%H8095><s%> shim-'On Simeon לֵוִ֣י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi Levi וִיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah, and Judah יִשָׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> yi-so-sh-Char Issachar וּזְבֻלֽוּן׃ <S%H2074><s%> u-ze-vu-Lun. and Zebulun

דָּ֚ן <S%H1835><s%> dan Dan יוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Joseph וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> u-vin-ya-Min, and Benjamin נַפְתָּלִ֖י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li Naphtali גָּ֥ד <S%H1410><s%> gad Gad וְאָשֵֽׁר׃ <S%H836><s%> ve-'a-Sher. and Asher ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah עֵ֤ר <S%H6147><s%> 'er Er וְאוֹנָן֙ <S%H209><s%> ve-'o-Nan and Onan וְשֵׁלָ֔ה <S%H7956><s%> ve-she-Lah, and Shelah שְׁלוֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah [which] three נ֣וֹלַד <S%H3205><s%> No-lad were born ל֔וֹ lo, מִבַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> mib-bat- unto him of the daughter שׁ֖וּעַ <S%H7774><s%> Shu-a' Shua הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Nit; the Canaanitess וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become עֵ֣ר׀ <S%H6147><s%> 'er And Er בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor the firstborn יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah רַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' was evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God וַיְמִיתֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> vay-mi-Te-hu. and he slew ס sa-Mek

וְתָמָר֙ <S%H8559><s%> ve-ta-Mar And Tamar כַּלָּת֔וֹ <S%H3618><s%> kal-la-To, his daughter in law יָ֥לְדָה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah bare לּ֖וֹ lo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פֶּ֣רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Pe-retz him Pharez וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et זָ֑רַח <S%H2226><s%> Za-rach; and Zerah כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei All the sons יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah חֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah. [were] five ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- The sons פֶ֖רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Fe-retz of Pharez חֶצְר֥וֹן <S%H2696><s%> chetz-Ron Hezron וְחָמֽוּל׃ <S%H2538><s%> ve-cha-Mul. and Hamul ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons זֶ֗רַח <S%H2226><s%> Ze-rach, of Zerah זִ֠מְרִי <S%H2174><s%> Zim-ri Zimri וְאֵיתָ֧ן <S%H387><s%> ve-'ei-Tan and Ethan וְהֵימָ֛ן <S%H1968><s%> ve-hei-Man and Heman וְכַלְכֹּ֥ל <S%H3633><s%> ve-chal-Kol and Calcol וָדָ֖רַע <S%H1873><s%> va-Da-ra' and Dara כֻּלָּ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam all חֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah. five ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons כַּרְמִ֑י <S%H3756><s%> kar-Mi; of Carmi עָכָר֙ <S%H5917><s%> 'a-Char Achar עוֹכֵ֣ר <S%H5916><s%> o-Cher the troubler יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who מָעַ֖ל <S%H4603><s%> ma-'Al who transgressed בַּחֵֽרֶם׃ <S%H2764><s%> ba-Che-rem. in the thing accursed ס sa-Mek
וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons אֵיתָ֖ן <S%H387><s%> 'ei-Tan of Ethan עֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <S%H5838><s%> 'a-zar-Yah. Azariah

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei The sons חֶצְר֖וֹן <S%H2696><s%> chetz-Ron also of Hezron אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who נוֹלַד־ <S%H3205><s%> no-lad- that were born ל֑וֹ lo; אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרַחְמְאֵ֥ל <S%H3396><s%> ye-rach-me-'El unto him Jerahmeel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רָ֖ם <S%H7410><s%> ram and Ram וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כְּלוּבָֽי׃ <S%H3621><s%> ke-lu-Vai. and Chelubai

וְרָ֖ם <S%H7410><s%> ve-Ram And Ram הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּינָדָ֑ב <S%H5992><s%> 'am-mi-na-Dav; Amminadab וְעַמִּינָדָב֙ <S%H5992><s%> ve-'am-mi-na-Dav and Amminadab הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַחְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H5177><s%> nach-Shon, Nahshon נְשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> ne-Si prince בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וְנַחְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H5177><s%> ve-nach-shOn And Nahshon הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שַׂלְמָ֔א <S%H8007><s%> sal-Ma, Salma וְשַׂלְמָ֖א <S%H8007><s%> ve-sal-Ma and Salma הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֹּֽעַז׃ <S%H1162><s%> Bo-'az. Boaz

וּבֹ֙עַז֙ <S%H1162><s%> u-Vo-'az And Boaz הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עוֹבֵ֔ד <S%H5744><s%> o-Ved, Obed וְעוֹבֵ֖ד <S%H5744><s%> ve-'o-Ved and Obed הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשָֽׁי׃ <S%H3448><s%> yi-Shai. Jesse

וְאִישַׁ֛י <S%H3448><s%> ve-'i-Shai And Jesse הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּכֹר֖וֹ <S%H1060><s%> be-cho-Ro his firstborn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלִיאָ֑ב <S%H446><s%> 'e-li-'Av; Eliab וַאֲבִינָדָב֙ <S%H41><s%> va-'a-vi-na-Dav and Abinadab הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, the second וְשִׁמְעָ֖א <S%H8092><s%> ve-shim-'A and Shimma הַשְּׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi. the third
נְתַנְאֵל֙ <S%H5417><s%> ne-tan-'El Nethaneel הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I, the fourth רַדַּ֖י <S%H7288><s%> rad-Dai Raddai הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi. the fifth
אֹ֚צֶם <S%H684><s%> 'O-tzem Ozem הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi, the sixth דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I. the seventh

וְאַחְיֹתֵיהֶם ve-'ach-yo-tei-hem כוְאַחְיֹותֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H269><s%> ve-'ach-yo-tei-Hem other קצְרוּיָ֣ה <S%H6870><s%> tze-ru-Yah [were] Zeruiah וַאֲבִיגָ֑יִל <S%H26><s%> va-'a-vi-Ga-yil; and Abigail וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons צְרוּיָ֗ה <S%H6870><s%> tze-ru-Yah, of Zeruiah אַבְשַׁ֛י <S%H52><s%> 'av-Shai Abishai וְיוֹאָ֥ב <S%H3097><s%> ve-yo-'Av and Joab וַעֲשָׂה־ va-'a-sah- אֵ֖ל <S%H6214><s%> 'el and Asahel שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah. three

וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <S%H26><s%> va-'a-vi-Ga-yil And Abigail יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲמָשָׂ֑א <S%H6021><s%> 'a-ma-Sa; Amasa וַאֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> va-'a-Vi and the father עֲמָשָׂ֔א <S%H6021><s%> 'a-ma-Sa, of Amasa יֶ֖תֶר <S%H3500><s%> Ye-ter [was] Jether הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִֽי׃ <S%H3459><s%> hai-yish-me-'e-Li. the Ishmeelite

וְכָלֵ֣ב <S%H3612><s%> ve-cha-Lev And Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֶצְר֗וֹן <S%H2696><s%> chetz-Ron, of Hezron הוֹלִ֛יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲזוּבָ֥ה <S%H5806><s%> 'a-zu-Vah Azubah אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah [his] wife וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et [children] of יְרִיע֑וֹת <S%H3408><s%> ye-ri-'ot; and of Jerioth וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh and these בָנֶ֔יהָ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nei-ha, her sons יֵ֥שֶׁר <S%H3475><s%> Ye-sher [are] these Jesher וְשׁוֹבָ֖ב <S%H7727><s%> ve-sho-Vav and Shobab וְאַרְדּֽוֹן׃ <S%H715><s%> ve-'ar-Don. and Ardon

וַתָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> vat-Ta-mot was dead עֲזוּבָ֑ה <S%H5806><s%> 'a-zu-Vah; And when Azubah וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-kach- took ל֤וֹ lo כָלֵב֙ <S%H3612><s%> cha-Lev Caleb אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶפְרָ֔ת <S%H672><s%> 'ef-Rat, unto him Ephrath וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led which bare ל֖וֹ lo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֽוּר׃ <S%H2354><s%> Chur. him Hur

וְחוּר֙ <S%H2354><s%> ve-Chur And Hur הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אוּרִ֔י <S%H221><s%> 'u-Ri, Uri וְאוּרִ֖י <S%H221><s%> ve-'u-Ri and Uri הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּצַלְאֵֽל׃ <S%H1212><s%> be-tzal-'El. Bezaleel ס sa-Mek

וְאַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char, And afterward בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> ba went in חֶצְרוֹן֙ <S%H2696><s%> chetz-rOn Hezron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- to the daughter מָכִיר֙ <S%H4353><s%> ma-Chir of Machir אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad, of Gilead וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he לְקָחָ֔הּ <S%H3947><s%> le-ka-Chah, whom he married וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim when he [was] threescore שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led and she bare ל֖וֹ lo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׂגֽוּב׃ <S%H7687><s%> se-Guv. him Segub

וּשְׂג֖וּב <S%H7687><s%> u-se-Guv And Segub הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָאִ֑יר <S%H2971><s%> ya-'Ir; Jair וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- had ל֗וֹ lo, עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim and twenty וְשָׁלוֹשׁ֙ <S%H7969><s%> ve-sha-lo-Vosh who had three עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim, cities בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad. of Gilead

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach And he took גְּשֽׁוּר־ <S%H1650><s%> ge-shur- Geshur וַ֠אֲרָם <S%H758><s%> Va-'a-rom and Aram אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for חַוֹּ֨ת <S%H2333><s%> chav-Vot with the towns יָאִ֧יר <S%H2971><s%> ya-'Ir of Jair מֵאִתָּ֛ם <S%H853><s%> me-'it-Tam אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with קְנָ֥ת <S%H7079><s%> ke-Nat from them with Kenath וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּנֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tei-ha and the towns שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim thereof [even] threescore עִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> 'Ir; cities כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei All these [belonged to] the sons מָכִ֥יר <S%H4353><s%> ma-Chir of Machir אֲבִי־ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi- the father גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad. of Gilead

וְאַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char And after מוֹת־ <S%H4194><s%> mot- was dead חֶצְר֖וֹן <S%H2696><s%> chetz-Ron that Hezron בְּכָלֵ֣ב be-cha-Lev אֶפְרָ֑תָה <S%H3613><s%> 'ef-Ra-tah; in Calebephratah וְאֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> ve-'E-shet wife חֶצְרוֹן֙ <S%H2696><s%> chetz-rOn Hezron's אֲבִיָּ֔ה <S%H29><s%> 'a-vi-Yah, then Abiah וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led bare ל֔וֹ lo, אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַשְׁח֖וּר <S%H806><s%> 'ash-Chur him Ashur אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father תְקֽוֹעַ׃ <S%H8620><s%> te-Ko-a'. of Tekoa

וַיִּהְי֧וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the sons יְרַחְמְאֵ֛ל <S%H3396><s%> ye-rach-me-'El of Jerahmeel בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor the firstborn חֶצְר֖וֹן <S%H2696><s%> chetz-Ron of Hezron הַבְּכ֣וֹר׀ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor the firstborn רָ֑ם <S%H7410><s%> Ram; were Ram וּבוּנָ֥ה <S%H946><s%> u-vu-Nah and Bunah וָאֹ֛רֶן <S%H767><s%> va-'O-ren and Oren וָאֹ֖צֶם <S%H684><s%> va-'O-tzem and Ozem אֲחִיָּֽה׃ <S%H281><s%> 'a-chi-Yah. [and] Ahijah

וּמִשְׁפְּח֤וֹת <S%H4940><s%> u-mish-pe-Chot And the families סֹפְרִים֙ <S%H5608><s%> so-fe-Rim of the scribes; יֹשְׁבוּ yo-she-vu כיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei abide קיַעְבֵּ֔ץ <S%H3258><s%> ya'-Betz, at Jabez תִּרְעָתִ֥ים <S%H8654><s%> tir-'a-Tim the Tirathites שִׁמְעָתִ֖ים <S%H8101><s%> shim-'a-Tim the Shimeathites שׂוּכָתִ֑ים <S%H7756><s%> su-cha-Tim; [and] Suchathites הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah These הַקִּינִ֣ים <S%H7017><s%> hak-ki-Nim [are] the Kenites הַבָּאִ֔ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im, that came מֵחַמַּ֖ת <S%H2575><s%> me-cham-Mat Hammath אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- of the house רֵכָֽב׃ <S%H7394><s%> re-Chav. of Rechab ס sa-Mek
